Articles.Content: Last time I tried in 23.0 it worked, It should atleast..
Is there a reason why the FAR toolbar icon doesn't show up?

Is there a reason why the FAR toolbar icon doesn't show up?

Unfortunate that this mod seems not to work anymore, or at all with FAR.

Unfortunate that this mod seems not to work anymore, or at all with FAR.

I'm having problems with the cockpit, Kerbals can't get into it. Everything else works though
This looks really good. I especially like the cockpit.
Its not a P-51, the engine is circular, not oblong shaped. Most likely a F4U Corsair.
Nazari, could you make an update for .90?
I hate to necro, but I really miss these parts...
So do I. Is it confirmed that they no longer work?
They "might" work but it'll probably be sketchy as heck... I wish he updated these to 1.0.2 I love these parts.
What about just the falcon? It's just plane parts, what all would be messed up? Besides the new aero...but it might still work.

Even though I do plan to update these parts more and include them with some new ones, after testing I think the Falcon is ready to be uploaded on its own.

Download: Mysterious Projects Falcon Pack

Craft file: http://www./download/pois6cic8zkrvfb/Falcon+I.craft

- New RPM props, including HUD with functional and transparent screens

- Flight model tuned for new 1.0 Aero (airbrakes too)

Edited May 9, 2021 by Snark
Link to defunct website removed by moderator
Hey Nazari, glad to see the Falcon is back! Great job with that.

glad to see you have updated this mod but the areo dynamics still need work. it flys out of control with tiny steering adjustments

update found it was the jet engine i was using,

Edited May 13, 2015 by callumrooney98
An F-16 replica with a working UCP ? Amazing !

First off i love the iva cockpit very cool but am i installing wrong but are the part tectures(not iva) meant to be plainish or silver...also not having a go or trying to be an ass i was just wondering or do i have to have certain settings....and all the parts are great...

I put together a small update for the rover, in light of the upcoming "anniversary". It includes support for turning Karbonite into fuel for the rover, and small vtol engines that can be surface attached to the bottom of the rover (or any other craft you like, just remember to add a capacitor).

https://kerbalstuff.com/mod/1215/Mysterious%20Projects:%20Dr.%20Lirius%20Rover
